about_the_game:
GreenGrocer Simulator



Experience the excitement of running your own fruit and vegetable shop! In this realistic and immersive simulation game, you'll need to purchase fresh produce at the right times, stock your shelves, and keep your customers happy. Make strategic decisions to grow your business and become the most popular greengrocer in town!

Key Features of the Game

Realistic Gameplay:
"GreenGrocer Simulator" offers you the opportunity to run your own fruit and vegetable shop by purchasing fresh produce from suppliers at the right times. Manage your inventory according to the seasons and customer demands to maximize your sales.

Customer Satisfaction:
Understanding the needs and preferences of your customers is crucial. Each customer has different desires and budgets, so you'll need to offer a variety of products and implement effective pricing strategies to increase customer satisfaction. Happy customers will become loyal patrons, helping you grow your business.

Shop Expansion and Customization:
Use your earnings to expand and enhance your shop. Add new shelves, decorations, and equipment to make your shop more attractive. Additionally, you can introduce new products and services to further grow your business. Personalize your shop to provide a unique shopping experience for your customers.

Daily Tasks and Events:
Every day, you'll encounter new tasks that present opportunities to improve your shop and earn extra income. You can also organize special events and promotions to attract more customers and boost your sales.

Detailed Management:
"GreenGrocer Simulator" provides you with detailed tools to manage your business. Make strategic decisions regarding pricing, inventory management, promotions, and customer service to grow your business. Carefully manage every aspect of your business to enjoy the success of running a prosperous greengrocer shop.

Visual and Audio Experience:
The game's colorful graphics and realistic sound effects provide you with a fully immersive greengrocer shop experience. Detailed shop interiors and customer interactions enrich the game's atmosphere.

Why Play "GreenGrocer Simulator"?

"GreenGrocer Simulator" offers a fun and rewarding gaming experience for both beginners and experienced players. Here’s why you should give this game a try:

  • Strategic Thinking: Use your strategic thinking skills to grow your business and keep your customers satisfied.
  • Creativity: Showcase your creativity by customizing your shop and adding decorations.
  • Realistic Simulation: Feel like you’re running a real greengrocer shop with realistic game mechanics and detailed management tools.
  • Fun and Satisfaction: Experience a sense of accomplishment as you complete tasks and grow your business throughout the game.

"GreenGrocer Simulator" will let you experience the challenges and joys of running a successful greengrocer shop. Join the game now and enjoy the thrill of managing your own greengrocer shop!

content_descriptors.notes: "Our game, GreenGrocer Simulator, does not contain any content that falls into the categories of violence, blood, nudity, or explicit sexual content. The game focuses on managing a fruit and vegetable shop, including activities such as stocking shelves, setting prices, and serving customers. There are no scenes that include drug use, alcohol, self-harm, or any content that would be unsuitable for a general audience. The game is designed to be suitable for players of all ages."

name: GreenGrocer Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: © 2024 ClickArt's Games. All rights reserved. GreenGrocer Simulator is a trademark of ClickArt's Games.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: © 2024 ClickArt's Games. All rights reserved. GreenGrocer Simulator is a trademark of ClickArt's Games.

short_description: GreenGrocer Simulator: Manage your own greengrocer shop! Sell fresh produce, satisfy your customers, and expand your business in this realistic and engaging simulation game. Experience the joy of running a successful greengrocer!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Turkish, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Swedish
